Game.Player

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Player.AbstractPlayer
      • Game.Player.Bot

  • public class Bot
extends AbstractPlayer
    Bot is a computer controlled player that plays with the logic given and is not controlled by an end user.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    vikfll-0
